sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import useStyles from './styles' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography, } from '@material-ui/core' import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/DeleteOutline' import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHorizOutlined' import moment from 'moment' import DeleteOutline from '@material-ui/icons/DeleteOutline' const Post = ({ post }) => { const classes = useStyles() return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `)}
{post.message} ) } export default Post
